h2_title: Centipede Guai Boss Fight and Guide
content: However, when you see the Centipede Guai stand up on its two legs, back off your attack immediately. It will start spewing poison down below its body as it staggers around, hoping to catch you unaware.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Centipede_Guai.md', within the main section titled 'Centipede Guai', specifically from the subsection 'Centipede Guai Boss Fight and Guide'.
The content is as follows:
However, when you see the Centipede Guai stand up on its two legs, back off your attack immediately. It will start spewing poison down below its body as it staggers around, hoping to catch you unaware.
